General.Name: Canada Energy Partners Inc
General.Description: Canada Energy Partners Inc. operates as an independent natural gas exploration and development company. The company primarily focuses on conventional oil and gas assets in Africa and Latin America. Canada Energy Partners Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 669 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 0B4
